review: sure it was cringe at times sewers sewers sewers but it was still a satisfying end to the deponia trilogy

funny  really liked it

i know i played the deponia games in chronological order originally  but i dont remember what that order was so whatever  i think of them all as one game in essence and it was a good game it just happens to be split into multiple parts

you know i didnt like the ending in the sense that i wish it was a happier ending but that doesnt mean i hated the game it was fun and entertaining every step of the way and was filled with some big surprises as well aside from one minigame that was absolutely broken and dumb that wouldnt work and you have to skip it was fun 910
the deponia games are an okay point and click franchise this one has some of the worst puzzles and bad writing
i dream gal in real life now
an excellent continuation of the best game series from daedalic packed with humor moderately challenging puzzles and most importantly an outstanding storyline 10 out of 10
love the deponia series i really enjoyed this game especially when i had to play three characters separately
more fun chaos

i liked the way the game logic forced rufus to triplicate himself and how the  3 rufuses will save goal again and again and againi did laugh here and there but less than in deponia and chaos on deponiathe game for me pickup was at the endand i liked rufus singing the organon hymn disguisng as cletus and all believed that he was cletusi also liked when 31 cletus met to smash the transmittertheres a lesson to learn here on cooperation and sacrifice
groovy game
funny and fun puzzle game unique characters
gorgeous
youve played the previous this one also gets boring after a while so you put it aside until you miss the silly humour and cheap farces worth it when at a good deal

as a conclusion for a trilogy it was great it was the most complicated one so far but it really feels more polished i honestly did like the story and the ending everyone complains about its a really nice ending to a fun charming adventure yeah ignore the fourth game
that one nearly broke my head goal is stil sassy

playing this again after 10 years  my my time do fly  i remember bits and pieces as i go along it has some great moments fave is the wash cycle but in terms of puzzles i did find it the weakest but it makes up for that in absurd fun  can recommend even nowadays its quality can stand up to other games
not quite on par with the last two but it was enjoyable
all of the games are amazing reccomend to play this with someone 3
i really liked hotel level of the game the hotel gave very eerie vibes june  unexpected ending totally stunning game
great fun
masterpiece
i absolutely love these deponia games  i hope the dev keeps them coming  they are humorous and have great story lines  you will not be disappointed playing this series
as a point and click genre veteran i really do enjoy these types of games and this series didnt disappoint

the story line is good but three clones of rufus make it a bit tougher goodbye duponia has pros and cons when i compare with predecessors though i liked it when i got lost at some points i had difficulty to find help from any walkthrough source since all are mixed with deprecated info anyway the game is good for children if you can catch it on sale i recommend it by the way it requires lots of patience
1010 even thouh de ending was sum buulshit hoping they fixed it in doomsday
one of the best casual games
its still fun

point and click game reminds me of day of the tentacle etc great humour frustrating and annoying  just like i remember day of the tentacle being i got it for an incredibly low price under 2 pounds in a  steam sale and after 8 hours it says im only 20 of the way through so i think thats superb value
very good game with which the trilogy ends very entertaining and impressive due to several new characters that show that reality is different from what rufus thinks 1010
very fun played while screen sharing with someone else for a coop run and we enjoyed solving the puzzles and the story interesting new mecanic in the second half of the game
didnt beat the game for badge play the complete journey
finisher for the trilogy concludes many story parts story and visuals are superb as always worth it
i knew i had to use a guide even before buying it and it is still worth it the characters are so charming
best adventure game ever good jokes bold game big fan
funny interesting and sometimes challenging love it
das imo beste deponia

overall this game wasnt as good as the previous two although it did have some cool new game play elements also this game was even more messed up vulgar and gruesome than the previous games which is saying a lot the story did get fairly good near the end though
great point and click game
goodbye deponia is the third installment in the deponia series
a fittind end to the best pointnclick puzzle trilogy ever

its okay the jokes are great for the most part but disgustingly insensitive on special but not infrequent occasions this makes it hard to fully recomment the game even though there is so much effort and love put within and its noticeable if you played the others definitely finish things with this one its by far the best if you didnt and just want to try this one all on its own dont bother im sorry
huzzah  good things come in threes    its still a good game but the ending sucks    story  410 graphics  810 sound  810 gameplay  610
100 baby
as good as all the series ending is unexpectedly oddly satisfying

i have mixed feelings for this game it forces you to make strange decisions just to follow a storyline and sometimes the storytelling is so complex you cant really follow anymore all the challenges you need to solve it has some sense of humor that can be tough for sensitive audiences but the story itself is nice and it has some real funny moments so i recommend it though its not the best deponia game or the best of the point and click games

honestly i didnt like the ending the whole trilogy was great though and they ended off the series with a bang highly recommended especially with it going on sale pretty often if you love point and clicks then you shouldnt pass this one up its super fun

this is the third game in the deponia series once again it keeps its great and fun story and keeps on getting more chaotic   as with the other two if you like pointandclick adventures have a good sense of humor and liked the previous games youre in the right place   play it after youve played bdeponiab and bchaos on deponiab
good

goodbye deponia is a brilliant third entry in the deponia series but with a plot that really provides one twist to the story that the last two games presented the comedic nature is still there but the plot twist and the ending are quite the surprise  the game has a nice array of characters to meet including some old ones from the previous games and the puzzles are a nice assortment once more definitely get this game if you played through the last two
yes very good

a lot of my love for the deponia series comes from nostalgia so im a bit biased though i do think its one of the best point  clicks out there just enough chaos plenty of humour and fun art style the storyline gets more complex and surprising as you go on through the series so i would really recommend going all out and getting them all if these sort of games are your cup of tea
the 3rd in the series a great entry if not quite as great as previous entries still loads of fun wacky pointandclicking to be had enjoy

imho the best part of the trilogy puzzles and tasks are much logically structured than in previous two parts humour remembers the good times when people had freedom to joke without risking to lose their business or social life because someone lacks comfort there are plenty of locations in the game lots of different scenes about different situations happening in real life authors can easily joke about sensitive topics as rufus is charismatic but not morally ideal hero
nice quest
i really like this game series i recommend everyone that likes point  click adventures to try this game this is the third game in the series and its as funny as the other ones
funny and entertaining
this is the third game in the series but just as good as the first two if you already have them or planning to get them you should get this one too

id recommend but only if you enjoyed the first two games deponia and chaos on deponia  all are point and click puzzle games in a terry pratchettesque style were you take control of a moronic simp  dumb with fun times
a great game in the trilogy

a somewhat funny poinclick game the achievements are sometimes kinda hard to come by and are not that obvious to get the jokes at least in the original german dub are sometimes a bit questionable when refering to hitler or making somewhat racists jokes but i guess jokes changed over the years with political correctness taking over  overall i would rate it 710
